Bill, 

Options:
1. Ugly Stacktrace during lazy init, also obscuring failure during runtime
2. Synchronization overhead with null check
3. Filter classes to exclude ejb classes

One more option

4. Use testing plugins - http://martinfowler.com/isa/plugins.html

This will allow you define a properties file or something similar to define the implementation that you actually use during runtime. You can just swap in a NULL object for testing that will do nothing when you test outside your ejb environment. 

--
